sentences.en: A generalized summarization is made for the automotive brake material.
sentences.cn: 摘要介绍汽车制动器摩擦材料的研究现状.

sentences.en: Aid engineer for yield improvement and test results summarization.
sentences.cn: 和设备工程部合作解决问题.

sentences.en: Automatic text summarization provides a concise summary for a document.
sentences.cn: 自动文字摘要为一份文集提供一项简洁的摘要.

sentences.en: By experiment examination , this mathematical model is altitudinal summarization and accurate.
sentences.cn: 根据不同的反应条件,深入研究并建立及推广了生成物浓度数学模型.

sentences.en: Finally it is summarization and prospect of USB system.
sentences.cn: 最后是对系统开发的总结和对USB技术的展望.

sentences.en: Good methods come from hard work and summarization.
sentences.cn: 好方法来自勤劳肯干、深钻细研.

sentences.en: In Part VII author gave a summarization to the whole dissertation.
sentences.cn: 第七部分是对整篇论文的总结.

sentences.en: Large masses of data must generally undergo a process of summarization or reduction before are comprehensible.
sentences.cn: 数量庞大的数据通常必须经过概括或删减的程序才能为人所理解.

sentences.en: Monthly project report, project review and summarization.
sentences.cn: 每月项目状况报告, 回顾及总结.

sentences.en: Summarization help reduce routing - table size.
The pipeline processes documents before they are indexed in the full-text index, and it provides automated summarization, document format conversion, and categorization services (See Figure 1).
sentences.cn: 在全文索引中建立文档的索引之前，管道将对文档进行处理，并且提供了自动化的摘要、文档格式转换和分类服务（请参见图 1）。

sentences.en: The same network without summarization has 10,000 routes in every routing table.
sentences.cn: 同样的网络,不使用摘要时每个路由表有10,000条路由.

sentences.en: The subject of racism is admittedly too complex for facile summarization.
sentences.cn: 无可否认，种族主义这个话题太过复杂，不可能一言蔽之。

sentences.en: This is a summarization of the experience gained in other countries.
Training summarization evaluation report to T & D manager for training quality enhancement continued.
sentences.cn: 总结 及 评估培训效果并反馈培训经理,持续提高培训质量.

sentences.en: When you do not use summarization to assign IP addresses, problems occur.
sentences.cn: 问题出现在当你不使用摘要来分配IP地址时.
